Vue JS

Vue JS

It's a web ui library like react. But just.... better. It's pretty flexible and you can create a simple web widget that you just put into an html section. Or you can create full single page apps with it.

Vue 3 new features

Composition API: imporves re-usability, organization and readablility with the setup() func

Component teleportation: you can reshuffle deeply nested html elements to put them in different places in the dom

Suspense component: Better async handling.

Typescript support
